caption.title: Experimentally obtained localization precision σ for Alexa 647 and Alexa 750.
caption.p: Glass slides were washed, plasma cleaned and coated with Poly-L-lysine (0.01% in water) for 1h. Conjugated antibodies were diluted in PBS to a final concentration of ~10 nM and adsorbed to the coated glass slides. Individual molecules were imaged under experimental conditions. Localizations originating from single Alexa 647 ( A) and Alexa 750 ( B) molecules were aligned to allow the estimation of the average localization precision: σ x,y A647 = 12 nm and σ x,y A750 = 21 nm.
